recipe.name: Margherita Pizza
recipe.description: Classic pizza topped with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil leaves.

recipe.name: Beef Burger
recipe.description: Juicy beef patty topped with lettuce, tomato, onions, and served on a toasted bun with fries.

recipe.name: Chicken Shawarma
recipe.description: Grilled chicken wrapped in pita bread with garlic sauce, tomatoes, and pickles.

recipe.name: Veggie Wrap
recipe.description: Assorted vegetables wrapped in a tortilla with hummus spread, perfect for a light lunch.

recipe.name: BBQ Ribs
recipe.description: Tender pork ribs slow-cooked and glazed with barbecue sauce, served with coleslaw.
